SAM Simulation Core (SSC)

PVIOManager Class Reference

This class contains the input and output data needed by all of the submodels in the detailed PV model It is intended to be passed as a pointer and modified with the goal of encapsulating all input that comes in at the user level and all output that needs to ultimately be passed back to the user. Detailed Description

This class contains the input and output data needed by all of the submodels in the detailed PV model It is intended to be passed as a pointer and modified with the goal of encapsulating all input that comes in at the user level and all output that needs to ultimately be passed back to the user.

Note
The PVIOManager contains structures that contain specific information about each system component
